name: MBDyn

projects.summary: Introduction to Google Summer of Code and the MBDyn project, explaining the partnership and objectives.
A test designed for applicants to assess their readiness and compatibility with the project requirements for GSoC.
A compilation of common queries and concerns related to GSoC and the MBDyn project, offering guidance to potential participants.
List of potential projects for GSoC that students can choose to work on, detailing focus areas and objectives for each project.
Dedicated space for students to share their experiences and updates during the GSoC program, fostering community and knowledge exchange.
Documentation outlining best practices and protocols for contributing to the MBDyn project, helping new contributors align with standards.
Information on continuous integration processes within the MBDyn development cycle, aimed at ensuring code quality and stability.
A curated list of tasks and projects that require attention or are open for contributions within the MBDyn project framework.
A project focusing on developing an adapter for integrating MBDyn with preCICE, enhancing multi-physics simulation capabilities.
